mapper.select: select id, machine_id, address, company_id, principal, reg_tel, reg_date, status, detail, use, regist_time, update_time from tb_machineroom where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_machineroom(machine_id, address, company_id, principal, reg_tel, reg_date, status, detail, use, regist_time, update_time) values (#{machineId}, #{address}, #{companyId}, #{principal}, #{regTel}, #{regDate}, #{status}, #{detail}, #{use}, #{registTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into tb_machineroom(machine_id, address, company_id, principal, reg_tel, reg_date, status, detail, use, regist_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.machineId}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.companyId}, #{entity.principal}, #{entity.regTel}, #{entity.regDate}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.detail}, #{entity.use}, #{entity.registTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into tb_machineroom(machine_id, address, company_id, principal, reg_tel, reg_date, status, detail, use, regist_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.machineId}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.companyId}, #{entity.principal}, #{entity.regTel}, #{entity.regDate}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.detail}, #{entity.use}, #{entity.registTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update machine_id = values(machine_id), address = values(address), company_id = values(company_id), principal = values(principal), reg_tel = values(reg_tel), reg_date = values(reg_date), status = values(status), detail = values(detail), use = values(use), regist_time = values(regist_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update tb_machineroom
machine_id = #{machineId},
address = #{address},
company_id = #{companyId},
principal = #{principal},
reg_tel = #{regTel},
reg_date = #{regDate},
status = #{status},
detail = #{detail},
use = #{use},
regist_time = #{registTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
